column2: Followers of Chaos Undivided who wish to bring glory to the Gods and themself, gather in mighty warbands, trying to prove their mettle and proves. Through skill, faith and dedication, they bring glory to chaos!
Mightiest chaos warrior that has proven to be worthy of Gods and warband leadership.

Followers of Papa Nurgle who wish to spread the great plagues and bring forth uncleanness to the world, gather in mighty warbands. Dedicating their bodies to act as hosts for new gifts of the Great Unclean one.
The most proven follower of the Lord of Pestilance, worthy of leading the smoldering warband of decay.

Followers of The Raven God, ever wanting to bring change and their schemes to fruition, gather in mighty warbands. Dedicating themselfs to studying the ruinous powers and using their gained powers to bring change to the world.
The most proven follow of the Lord of Change, his scheming and power unmatched, worthy of warbands tricky leadership.
Followers of the Dark Prince gather into mighty warbands to share and expand their decadency, and to seek out new forms of excess and pleasure. All in the name of The Prince.
Most dedicated follower to the Prince of Pleasure, that has tried every imaginary form of excess and still keeps finding new ways to bring themselfs new feelings.

Followers of the Blood God, always wanting to spill blood and fight for honor and glory, gather into mighty warbands.To prove their skill and worthyness, they bringing fire, death and destruction to everything on their warring path.
Most skilled warrior of the warband that proven his steel and mettle countless times. Worthy of the warbands leadership.
The decision to Duel your foes becomes available.
The decision to appoint somebody a Shieldmaiden becomes available, provided she is your sister or daughter.
You are more resilient to battle injuries.
When leading troops, your experience gives you access to new events on the field of battle.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, to summon a special Commander character to your court.
Enables you to §Gright-click§! on a holding, in order to instantly refill its Garrison.
Sacrifice to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to gain a boon in upcoming battles.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait, in order to give yourself the Champion trait.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character portrait, in order to get yourself an Imp.
While leading armies, you no longer suffer lethal injuries from the battles.

As long as you are at war and leading troops, you can activate a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, which will continuously grant soldiers to your troops, appearing at your current location. Once peace is established, the regiments will take their leave..
When leading armies and successfully sieging holdings, you have a greater chance of capturing enemies and looting artifacts from the holder.
Change lifestyle trait, so it suits your warmongering better.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait, in order to give yourself a chaos Aspect.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait, in order to become a Khorne Berserker
Choose to focus on one of the three lifestyle aspects. Doing so will allow you to choose a new Lifestyle trait out of the selection.
Your dedication has not been unnoticed, you have proven yourself over and over to be a dedicated and eager servant of ruinous powers. Deserving of Champions mark!
Through rituals and sacrifices, while conjuring with chaos, ruinous powers may reward you with their spawns.
As long as you are at war and leading troops, more warriors will flock to your banner, appearing at your current location. Once peace is established, the regiments will take their leave..
Is a member of a Warband
Is the Champion of the Dark Gods
Is member of the same warband
A warrior cannot afford to grow idle, in the comfort of their home! Spreading one's name, as well as domain, is a clear path to glory.
To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of the top holder of your target province and choose to §YDeclare War§!, using §YConquest of [From.Location.GetName]§!.
It could be that our descendants follow in our footsteps, but to make certain that the legacy of our Warband continues, encouraging our young is key.
To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of your target and choose to §YRecruit§! them.
Members of the Warband often spar with one another, for practice, recreation and for the glory og the Gods. It is not a duty one neglects without notice.
To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of your target and choose to §YDuel§! them.
It is important to occasionally test one's mettle and prove oneself as a warrior. A straight-forward way is to seek out enemies and deal with them, personally...
To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of your target and choose to §YDuel§! them.
You must lead your raiders to loot [From.Location.GetName] to prove your worth and gain the riches laying within it.
To complete this mission, personally lead your troops to loot §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!.
The older members of [Root.Society.GetName] are concerned that I might be neglecting my training to focus on other, menial activities.
To complete this mission, select the §YWar Focus§!.
The older members of [Root.Society.GetName] have suggested that I spend some time refining my senses by hunting wild game.
To complete this mission, select the §YHunting Focus§!.
The older members of [Root.Society.GetName] are concerned that I am neglecting my duties as [Root.GetTitle] to focus on other menial activities.
To complete this mission, select the §YRulership Focus§!.
There is a time for fighting and a time for celebrating, and the older members of [Root.Society.GetName] are concerned that I might be neglecting the latter to focus on other, menial activities.
To complete this mission, select the §YCarousing Focus§!.
Bubo are tiny versions of Nurglings, being delicate, fragile, foul, and green. They look like small withered peas but are dimpled with sphincters that issue foul yellow wetness.

Fearling are small balls of pink flesh, like a miniature Horror of Tzeentch. It sits and quivers, expelling blue and pink flames from its many mouths. When it moves, it pulls itself along with pseudopodia, scorching the ground wherever it goes.
Malice are miniature warriors encased in black armour. They look like tiny Warriors of Chaos and indeed, they have the temperament of the most vicious Khorne Champion.

Muse take the form of a beautiful young women with perfect nubile bodies and long hair of scintillating colours. They are tiny, no taller than three feet, but despite their size, they have power over men, stealing their souls, and draining away the capacity for sensation.

column1: ###new events locs, rest of the WB locs are used directly from HolyFury locs and probably need some change to fit the warband

column2: You feel power rushing into you, ruinous powers rewarding you for your sacrifices. All the hard work and dedication finally payed out. You have became a Champion of Chaos Undivided
You feel the rot flow through you, Papa's powers rewarding you for your sacrifices. All the hard work and dedication finally payed out. You have became a Champion of Nurgle
You feel power rushing through you, Changer of Way powers rewarding you for your sacrifices. All the scheming and dedication finally payed out. You have became a Champion of Tzeentch
You feel ecstasy rushing into you, The Prince rewarding you for your excess. All the decadency and debuchery finally payed out. You have became a Champion of Slaanesh
You feel rage rushing through you, Blood God rewarding you for your slaughter. All the hard work and training finally payed out. You have became a Champion of Khorne
Through dedication, rituals and sacrificing, ruinous powers have rewarded you with their spawn

Imps are the least of the least, minor Daemons that are born from loosed emotions. In their natural state, they are amorphous things, endlessly cycling through a variety of shapes that seem to reflect the thought or concept that birthed them. It is only when a Dark God claims an Imp that it becomes something,\n which Dark God do you claim your Imp from?

Imps of Nurgle are tiny versions of Nurglings, being delicate, fragile, foul, and green. They look like small withered peas but are dimpled with sphincters that issue foul yellow wetness. These creatures thrive on sickness.

Imps of Tzeentch are small balls of pink flesh, like a miniature Horror of Tzeentch. It sits and quivers, expelling blue and pink flames from its many mouths. When it moves, it pulls itself along with pseudopodia, scorching the ground wherever it goes. Fearlings inspire rebellious thoughts and acts of anarchy.

Imps of Slaanesh are appealing, taking the form of beautiful young women with perfect nubile bodies and long hair of scintillating colours. They are tiny, no taller than three feet, but despite their size, they have power over men, stealing their souls, and draining away the capacity for sensation. But they are also inspiring, urging their victims to new heights, always pushing further and further to attain the glory they seek.

Imps of Khorne are miniature warriors encased in black armour. They look like tiny Warriors of Chaos and indeed, they have the temperament of the most vicious Khorne Champion. Malices feed on rage and hate, inspiring both in mortals.

Through constant training and fighting, through constant dedication and prowess. You have reached the point where your mind and body can go into eternal rage and only thirst for slaughter! You have became a berserker of Khorne.
